description: This file contains function prototypes and API documentation related to hardware health testing, specifically for getting and setting boolean parameter values and retrieving string parameter values for the X_RDK_hwHealthTest object.

methods.name: hwHealthTest_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a boolean parameter for hardware health testing.

methods.name: hwHealthTest_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets the value of a boolean parameter for hardware health testing.

methods.name: hwHealthTest_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a string parameter for hardware health testing.
